name: Bonded_Leather_Sofa
description: The modern appeal of the Lesley Series will make a lasting impression with your visitors. This sofa will make an ideal choice in the office and as waiting room seating. The contemporary design of this furniture adapts in several different settings. This sofa features tufted cushions and stainless steel frame enclosure.
